description: Validator for the Record Call callflow action

action.description: Whether to start or stop the recording

format.description: What format to store the recording on disk

record_min_sec.description: The minimum length, in seconds, the recording must be to be considered successful. Otherwise it is deleted

record_on_answer.description: Whether to delay the recording until the channel is answered

record_on_bridge.description: Whether to delay the recording until the channel is bridged

record_sample_rate.description: What sampling rate to use on the recording

time_limit.description: Time limit, in seconds, for the recording

url.description: The URL to use when sending the recording for storage
